title: 玩家名字前面怎么有等级
author: 肿瘤炮弹
txt_content:
就是像称号一样的升级
你升１级称号就会变动！

replies.author: zx1678338406
replies.txt_content:
用ess权限组制作  多做几个权限组 前缀不一样就可以了
  Shizhe:
    default: false
    permissions: 
    - -essentials.build.pickup.311
    - -essentials.build.pickup.303
    - -essentials.build.pickup.307
    - -essentials.build.pickup.299
    - -essentials.build.pickup.4221
    - -essentials.build.pickup.4121
    - -essentials.build.pickup.4207
    - -essentials.build.pickup.4120
    - -essentials.build.pickup.4123
    - -essentials.build.pickup.4297
    - -essentials.build.pickup.4125
    - -essentials.build.pickup.4315
    - -essentials.build.pickup.4206
    - -essentials.build.pickup.4333
    - -essentials.build.pickup.4229
    - -essentials.build.pickup.4329
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&f[&2xx大陆&f][&e新兵蛋子&f]'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
使用这个 多做几个权限组
然后用脚本方块插件来让玩家转入权限组即可

lichi2050 发表于 2015-10-15 02:14
